alert.note: Alert for Marion; McPherson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 01 at 12:28AM CDT until June 01 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern McPherson County in central Kansas... Northwestern Marion County in central Kansas... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1228 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Galva, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Galva, Canton and Roxbury. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
